0.muscle_description: Reverse flys are an effective exercise for the neck and back shoulders . Even those who do not have cable pulls or dumbbells can do this exercise with the help of a theraband . In the training focus of the reverse flys with the theraband are the middle fibres of the hood muscle .
0.exercise_execution: Stand hip-width on the floor, your upper body is stretched out, your lower back forms a slight hollow back, your abdominal muscles are tense and your gaze is straight out . Wrap one of the two ends of each band around one of your hands and grab it with fists . Now go back so far that the bands on your arms parallel to the floor are almost fully stretched forward .

1.exercise_title: Upright rowing on the cable pulley
1.muscle_description: Upright rowing, which is usually done with a barbell or SZ bar, can also be done on cable pulls . As with the classic version, this exercise also strengthens the upper fibres of the hood muscle .
1.exercise_execution: It's not the first time he's been spotted out and about in Los Angeles in recent weeks .

2.muscle_description: The chest press is the most well-known device for exercising chest muscles . It can be found in almost every gym . We will explain how to use it correctly in the following .
2.exercise_execution: Your back is upright, your head extends the spine and your gaze is straight out . Make sure that you press your back fully into the cushion . The weight block should not sit up, but stay suspended in the air until the end of the exercise .

3.exercise_title: Inclined bench press on the device
3.muscle_description: A popular strength machine at the gym is the incline bench press machine . It is especially recommended for training beginners who want to start exercising their upper chest muscles without free weights .
3.exercise_execution: It's not the first time he's been spotted out and about in Los Angeles in recent weeks .

4.muscle_description: A completely different exercise for exercising the hand curls are the forearm curls behind the back . In this version, you only need a barbell bar, theoretically you can also use two dumbbells . It should be noted that the wrist is not fully stretched and the athlete uses only part of the movement amplitude .
4.exercise_execution: Grasp a barbell bar about shoulder-width behind your body in the upper grip . Your feet are about hip-width apart, your abdominal muscles are tense and your lower back is straight . Your arms are almost fully stretched downwards and only form a small bend in the elbow to protect the joint .

5.exercise_title: One-arm triceps press on cable pulley
5.muscle_description: Those who are looking for a diversion from one-armed triceps press with dumbbell can also do the same exercise on the cable pull tower .
5.exercise_execution: Stand upright with your shoulders pulled backwards and chest stretched forward . Make a slight hollow back in your lower back and flex your abdominal muscles . Support your passive arm at your hip and lower your active arm with the grip piece up so that your upper arm is placed right next to your ear .

6.exercise_title: Vertical calf lift on the multi-press
6.muscle_description: Calf lifting while standing on the multi-press is especially suitable for gyms where there is no equipment of its own . This version is much safer to do and therefore preferable due to the securing possibilities and the guide rail .
6.exercise_execution: It's not the first time he's been spotted out and about in Los Angeles in recent weeks .

7.exercise_title: Donkey Calf Raise at the Multi Press
7.muscle_description: Most German gyms do not have Donkey-Calf-Raise device . If you want the pressure on the pelvis to come from above, create similar conditions on the rack or on the multi-press .
7.exercise_execution: It's not the first time he's been spotted out and about in Los Angeles in recent weeks .

8.muscle_description: Almost all gyms have an abdominal machine for the straight abdominal muscle (musculus rectus abdominis) There are no limits to the variety of equipment, but ultimately, a training weight is always moved with the torso and / or arms via a crunch movement .
8.exercise_execution: It's not the first time he's been spotted out and about in Los Angeles in recent weeks .

9.muscle_description: The most popular exercise for the lower abdominal muscles is knee lifting . This exercise is available in different variants: lying down, hanging, on cable pulls and on the machine . A so-called Captain's Chair, which is required for knee lifting, is required .
9.exercise_execution: Pull both knees up towards your chest and watch out for a slow and controlled movement . When you reach the top, hold the tension briefly and then start the downward movement . Complete 15-25 repetitions per set .

10.muscle_description: A popular exercise for exercising leg curls at home is leg lifting on all fours . As you kneel with your knee joints on the floor, it makes sense to use a training mat . If you don't have one, you can put a pillow, a folded towel or blanket under your knees .
10.exercise_execution: Walk on all fours so that your arms and thighs are at right angles to your upper body . Lower back is in a slight hollow cross position to relieve the intervertebral discs .

11.muscle_description: A classic exercise for these two muscle groups are the lunges . They train mainly the large gluteus maximus muscle and the leg extensions . The leg curl (musculus biceps femoris) is also used to a lesser extent .
11.exercise_execution: Take a wide step forward with one leg and breathe in at the same time . Care must be taken to select your step forward so that your lower and upper legs do not fall below a 90 degree angle .

12.muscle_description: Reverse flys are an effective exercise for the neck and back shoulders . Even those who do not have cable pulls or dumbbells can do this exercise with the help of a theraband . In the training focus of the reverse flys with the theraband are the middle fibres of the hood muscle .
12.exercise_execution: Stand hip-width on the floor, your upper body is stretched out, your lower back forms a slight hollow back, your abdominal muscles are tense and your gaze is straight out . Wrap one of the two ends of each band around one of your hands and grab it with fists . Now go back so far that the bands on your arms parallel to the floor are almost fully stretched forward .

13.exercise_title: Bent Reverse Flys on the cable pulley
13.muscle_description: Very rarely seen in the gym are the preventive reverse flys on the cable pulley . The reason for this is probably the fact that the butt is stretched out backwards while the torso is bent forward .
13.exercise_execution: Place yourself between two deep blocks and cross-grip the handles . With feet shoulder-width apart and legs slightly bent, bend your upper body until it is parallel to the floor . Lower back is in a slight hollow cross position, abdominal muscles are tense and chest is stretched forward . Now pull the two handles up as far as possible by your almost stretched arms and exhale while you do so .

14.muscle_description: The classic for the training of the saw muscle are the pullovers, also called coatings . This exercise trains particularly strongly the large pectoral muscle and less strongly the broad back muscle .
14.exercise_execution: It's not the first time he's been spotted out and about in Los Angeles in recent weeks .

15.muscle_description: This exercise corresponds to the movements on the butterfly machine or the butterflies on the cable tower . This exercise can only be done with a set of dumbbells and, if necessary, without a flat bench .
15.exercise_execution: Hold dumbbells with your arms stretched out vertically above your chest in a neutral grip position (hammer position) Your arms are not fully extended, but minimally flexed, which protects your elbow joints . Your lower back is slightly arched upwards, so does not touch the cushion of the bench .

16.muscle_description: The forearm curls are the forearm curls with the barbell in the upper grip . For this exercise you simply use a barbell bar instead of dumbbells .
16.exercise_execution: Grasp a barbell bar about shoulder-width in the upper grip and kneel in front of a flat bench . Place your forearms on the bench cushion so that your wrists protrude from the cushion on the other side . Relieve your slightly forward-bent torso in the lower back by forming a slight hollow back .

17.exercise_title: Face pressing on the deep block
17.muscle_description: If you are looking for a way to press your head with the SZ bar, you can do the same exercise on the cable pull . You also need a flat bench and a grip piece (straight bar, double mushroom, rope, curl bar, etc..).
17.exercise_execution: A small bend in the elbow protects the corresponding joint from an increased risk of injury . You start the exercise by controlling and slowly yielding to the pull of the cable . Then you stretch your forearms upwards again and exhale at the end .

18.muscle_description: Donkey-Calf-Raise device makes it possible to lift the calf with a bent hip . The weight to be mastered presses on the angled hip from above . It is more comfortable for many fitness athletes than the pressure on the shoulders .
18.exercise_execution: It's not the first time he's been spotted out and about in Los Angeles in recent weeks .

19.muscle_description: Squat is one of the most demanding and difficult exercises in strength sports . Due to the multitude of used muscles, this exercise is recommended for beginners, if it can be practiced under competent supervision .
19.exercise_execution: Place yourself under the barbell bar and place it on the rear shoulder muscles or on the hood muscle . Grab the bar significantly wider than shoulder width and push the elbows backwards . Lift the bar with straight torso and slightly hollow cross position in the lower back out of the mount .

20.muscle_description: Almost all gyms have an abdominal machine for the straight abdominal muscle (musculus rectus abdominis) There are no limits to the variety of equipment, but ultimately, a training weight is always moved with the torso and / or arms via a crunch movement .
20.exercise_execution: It's not the first time he's been spotted out and about in Los Angeles in recent weeks .

21.muscle_description: The toe touches are basically a variation of the classic crunches . They demand the abdominal muscles . Because the toe touches do not require any equipment, they can also be done at home .
21.exercise_execution: Lift your chest, shoulder blades off the floor and stretch your fingers towards your toes . Although the exercise is called toe touches, it is normal not to reach your toes in this exercise . At the highest point, hold the tension for a moment and then slowly lower your upper body back down .

22.muscle_description: Zercher squat is a variation of the classic barbell squat, where the weight rests in the armpits . It can also be done without a squat stand / rack and is suitable for exercising at home or places where there is no possibility of doing regular squats .
22.exercise_execution: In the Zercher squat, the barbell is lifted from the floor and positioned at hip level . If available, you can also place it slightly below hip height in a squat stand and lift it from there . You can lift it up from the thighs in the same way that you would lift up from a squat-stand .

23.muscle_description: Barbell climbers are a very popular fitness exercise for legs and buttocks . Only very few gyms have a large and above all stable stool, a box or a similar object, which requires this exercise .
23.exercise_execution: It's not the first time he's been spotted out and about in Los Angeles in recent weeks .
